```{r library, include=FALSE}
#load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```

```{r prelim}
#prelim
prelim <- readRDS(here::here("models", "prelim_run.Rds"))
show_best(prelim, metric = "roc_auc") %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
